_header: O Lord by whom all thing is wrought
Subjects: hymns, to Trinity; Trinity, hymns to
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Trinity — seven quatrains including refrain, ‘Honour to the alone’ and burden: ‘Honoure to the alone / That art bothe iij and one’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O lorde by whome althing is wroughtAnd withoute whom is wrought
                    right nought…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Of lest and moost in euery coostHonour to the
                    alone
